years of experience with largescale production environments across multiple platforms Capacity to give high level technical support in all sections of database administration including installation configuration upgrades patching migration capacity planning performance tuning backup and recovery I provide support in configuring and supporting Oracle Real Application Clusters RAC Golden Gate and Data Guard I can work both as an individual contributor and as a team player Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Oracle Database Administrator Riley Technologies Mooresville NC June 2016 to Present Supporting multiple databases for production development test and QA purposes on Linux and Windows environments Planning Implementing and Validating various versions of Oracle Databases to 12c Release upgrades on all the environments in a procedural approach Dev Test Stage QA and Production Applying PSU Patches 11203 11204 as a part of maintenance activity Installing Oracle 11g on Linux platform using ASM Configuring and worked in Oracle golden Gate installation configuration troubleshooting golden Gate issues Troubleshooting of various database performances by Analyzing the AWR ADDM and TKPROF for diagnosing the root cause of the issues Implementing Data Guard with high availability and performance configurations for disaster recovery and participating in Data Guard Fail over tests Handling all daily DBA activities and excellent experience with SQL scripting PLSQL triggers to enforce the referential integrity constraints and business rules Setting up Oracle ASM storage for Oracle RAC standalone database Assisting in SQL tuning through trending analysis and working with development teams on identifying tuning opportunities Performing security and auditing at higher levels Writing UNIXSHELL scripts to provide the reports Successfully implementing Backup Recovery using RMAN which includes hot backups and Cold backups Oracle Database Administrator Cooper Vision Inc Rochester NY July 2014 to June 2016 Implemented Flashback technology of the Oracle 11g for a faster recovery of the databases and database objects Performed full and incremental backup using RMAN and implemented recovery strategies Extensively used AWR ADDM and explain plan for periodic performance tuning Used importexport utilities for cloningmigration of small sized databases and Data pump importexport to move data between 10g and 10g11g environments Installed and configured Golden Gate replications monitoring scripts for Golden Gate in Unix scripting Achieved optimized performance for the databases by rebuilding indexes on table Involved in the installation configuration and extended support to Oracle 11g 10g two Node RAC Real Application Cluster with ASM file system on AIX platform Automated the processes like moving files managing alert log efficient backup by developing UNIX scripts 24 X 7 Production Development database support and administration
